name: Echoes Corridor
description:
You will wake up in a cell next to a radio that will guide you through the level giving you information about the environment, alerting you of the danger and helping you to escape, you can follow their instructions or explore the halls and rooms of the jail on our own.

Here is a little prototype some classmates and i did for a college project, hope you enjoy.
